channel.description: Front-end engineer who builds things for the web. Writing about JavaScript, React, TypeScript, and web development.

item.title: Creating CSS Grid Layouts the Easy Way
item.description: Learning CSS Grid may be a daunting task to many developers. We discuss the minimum you need to know before you become a Grid believer (Hint: named grid areas!)

item.title: Understanding the useEffect Hook Mindset
item.description: The trick to understanding useEffect is to figure out what your side effect should be "synced" with, rather than "when" it is happening.

item.title: Accessing, Typing, and Destructuring Props in Emotion
item.description: Dynamic component styling is an important benefit of using CSS-in-JS libraries. I go over patterns for using component props, destructuring them (or maybe not!), and giving them types using TypeScript.
